item.description:
Meet @ Corner Summer & Washington Streets

For those not going to the Horn Pond walk, or for those who prefer a later start and a more relaxed pace....

Join Walk Boston for their annual holiday stroll. This years walk is a guided tour of Boston's little lanes. This is a leisurely walk with stops along the way where the leader will describe the history and landmarks of the various lanes and their surroundings. The walk will last somewhere between 60-90 minutes and goes from downtown crossing along Tremont to the financial district, over to Fanieul Hall and ends at Haymarket.

http://www.walkboston...

.
item.name: Historic walk
